titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2038) to reauthorize the assault weapons ban, and for other purposes.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2038) to reauthorize the assault weapons ban, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Meehan. Petition No: 108-12.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2038 (Assault Weapons Ban and Law Enforcement Protection Act of 2003).
